doc.title: The New Kreskin Show
doc.plot: An updated revival of his earlier show, "The Amazing Kreskin." Following in the footsteps of earlier TV mentalists and mind-readers, this show featuring Kreskin claimed to show evidence of the powers of ESP. With celebrity guests from the sports and entertainment worlds, Kreskin would call supposedly random people from the audience and guess details about them that could not possibly have honestly known unless his powers of ESP were genuine.
